title: Relates to the information required by the sex offender registry
summary: Relates to the information required by the sex offender registry; requires the type of assigned supervision and the length of time of such supervision.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2565

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 19, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. COLTON, GUNTHER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.
         CONTE, McDONOUGH, MURRAY -- read once and referred to the Committee on
         Correction

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  correction law, in relation to the sex offender
         registry

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  (c)  of  subdivision 1 of section 168-b of the
    2  correction law, as amended by chapter 11 of the laws of 2002, is amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    (c) A description of the  offense  for  which  the  sex  offender  was
    5  convicted, the date of conviction and the sentence imposed INCLUDING THE
    6  TYPE OF ASSIGNED SUPERVISION AND THE LENGTH OF TIME OF SUCH SUPERVISION.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07494-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the sex offender registry
